title: Rule of Thumb.
ruleOfThumbText: Rule of Thumb is a crowd sourced court of public opinion where anyone and everyone can speak out and speak freely. It's easy: You share your opinion, we analyze and put the data in a public report.
cardDescription: He's talking tough on clergy sexual abuse, but is he just another papal pervert protector? (thumbs down) or a true pedophile punishing pontiff? (thumbs up)
